instance_template: loc("A"). loc("B"). loc("C"). loc("D"). loc("E"). edge("A", "B"). edge("A", "C"). edge("B", "D"). edge("C", "E"). time(0..6). deliver_to("D"). deliver_to("E").

hard_constraints.description: Initial State Policy: The robot is strictly required to begin its operation at Location A at the zero-minute mark.
Connectivity Compliance: To ensure safe navigation, the robot must only transition between locations that are explicitly connected in the facility map.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at(L1, T), at(L2, T+1), not edge(L1, L2), not edge(L2, L1), time(T), time(T+1).

hard_constraints.description: Delivery Quota Regulation: Every designated delivery site must be visited exactly once to satisfy fulfillment requirements.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- deliver_to(L), N = #count { T : at(L, T) }, N != 1.
